1.text: Order the weirdest latte flavour at a cafe within 2km and post a photo.

2.text: Find a local farmer's market and buy something unusual.

3.text: Attend a local food festival and try a dish you've never had before.

4.text: Visit a local brewery and sample their most unique beer.

5.text: Take a cooking class and learn to make a dish from a different culture.

6.text: Find a local food truck and try their most popular dish.

7.text: Visit a local vineyard and participate in a wine tasting.

8.text: Try a dish from a different culture at a local restaurant.

9.text: Visit a local chocolate shop and try their most unique chocolate.

10.text: Attend a local cooking competition and try the dishes.
